content.title: The independent R&D elite team
content.body: Since its establishment, ALD has been focusing on the innovation of electronic atomization technology and product research and development. Now it has formed an independent R&D elite team of more than 200 people, accounting for more than 80% of bachelor's degree and more than 10% of master's degree.

content.title: Cooperation with Domestic Famous Universities and Scientific Research Institutions
content.body: ALD established postdoctoral workstations in 2012, and then successively established cooperative relations with well-known universities and research institutions in China.

content.title: More than 200 technical patents at home and abroad
content.body: ALD has made extensive achievements in the core technology field of electronic atomization and forged strong technology brands-SILMO™ and MICROFEEL™. It is the first manufacturing enterprise to realize the batch automatic production of ceramic substrate thick film printing heater. Its research covers many fields such as polymer materials, nanomaterials, superconducting materials, advanced ceramics, fluid analysis, thermal field analysis, aerosol analysis, intelligent temperature control, intelligent identification, intelligent sensing, quick charging and ergonomics. The research results have been widely used in the research and development, design, manufacturing and testing of products. So far, ALD has owned more than 200 core patents at home and abroad.

content.title: Annual R&D Investment Accounts for More Than 10% of the Total Revenue
content.body: ALD attaches great importance to the R&D and innovation of technology, and the R&D investment accounts for more than 10% of the total revenue every year. Since the establishment, the R&D team has been actively innovating and exporting high-quality results. On the other hand, after years of hard study in the electronic atomization technology industry, the R&D team has accumulated unique experience and technology. Continuous optimization and upgrading of electronic atomization technology occupy a pivotal position in the field of electronic atomization technology.

content.title: Introduce IPD management system
content.body: Pioneering in atomization area, ALD keeps enlarging its R&D team. In order to manage product planning, development and life cycle management more scientifically, ALD introduced IPD management system. Taking market demand as the driving force of product development, ALD converts customer requirements into product and service attributes. Focusing on the quality, cost, serviceability and manufacturability of the products in the development process, ALD meets the all-round and multi-level needs of customers. In the future, ALD will always adhere to the spirit of pioneering and innovation to make contribution to the progress of electronic atomization technology in China and even the world.
